dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale not given (E 80째--E 120째/N 30째--N 1째). Relief shown by hachures. Map showing the boundaries of Catholic dioceses in Southeast Asia in the 1850s. Probably Tav. CVI from: L'orbe cattolico ossia Atlante geografico storico ecclesiastico / [opera del commendatore Girolamo Petri]. Roma : Tipografia della reverenda Camera apostolica, 1858-1859. Dimensions: 48 x 63 centimeters
